wf_workflow_version.name: Tracy - Story and deployment workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: state=2^EQ
state=2^EQ

wf_activity.name: If State is set to cancelled

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
state=4^EQ
state=4^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

activity.display_value: If State is set to cancelled

sys_variable_value.value: current.state = '4'; current.work_notes = 'Workflow cancelled by Tracy';
current.state = '4'; current.work_notes = 'Workflow cancelled by Tracy';
current.state = '4';
current.state = '4';
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
state=-8^EQ
state=-8^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

wf_activity.name: Wait for deployment is a successful or unsuccessful

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

activity.display_value: Wait for deployment is a successful or unsuccessful

wf_activity.name: Waiting for testing success or failure

sys_variable_value.value: stateIN2,3^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
stateIN2,3^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

activity.display_value: Waiting for testing success or failure

from.display_value: Wait for deployment is a successful or unsuccessful

to.display_value: If State is set to cancelled

from.display_value: Waiting for testing success or failure
If State is set to cancelled

to.display_value: Waiting for testing success or failure
Wait for deployment is a successful or unsuccessful
